translation.element: Some questions were not completed correctly, see details below.

Please enter your bank account number and sort code so that we can take payment from your account

Please pay %s from the account detailed in this instruction subject to the safeguards assured by the direct debit guarantee. I understand that this instruction may remain with the originator mentioned above and, if so, details will be passed electronically to my bank or building society.

Direct Debit Guarantee
This guarantee is offered by all banks and building societies that take part in the Direct Debit scheme. The efficiency and security of the scheme is monitored and protected by your own bank or building society.
  • If the amounts to be paid or the payment dates change, you will be told of this 8 days in advance of your account being debited.
  • If an error is made by %s or your bank or building society, you are guaranteed a full and immediate refund from your branch of the amount paid.
  • You can cancel a Direct Debit at any time by writing to your bank or building society. Please also send a copy of your letter to us.

Please note you have confirmed that you are not falsely representing yourself or impersonating someone else within the details you are submitting for this policy and payment. You also confirm that you are the only person required to authorise this debit from your account. If you can not comply please contact us.

You can contacted us on %s

Please pay %s from the account detailed in this instruction subject to the safeguards assured by the direct debit guarantee. I understand that this instruction may remain with the originator mentioned above and, if so, details will be passed electronically to my bank or building society.

Direct Debit Guarantee
This guarantee is offered by all banks and building societies that take part in the Direct Debit scheme. The efficiency and security of the scheme is monitored and protected by your own bank or building society.
  • If the amounts to be paid or the payment dates change, you will be told of this 8 days in advance of your account being debited.
  • If an error is made by %s or your bank or building society, you are guaranteed a full and immediate refund from your branch of the amount paid.
  • You can cancel a Direct Debit at any time by writing to your bank or building society. Please also send a copy of your letter to us.

Please note you have confirmed that you are not falsely representing yourself or impersonating someone else within the details you are submitting for this policy and payment. 总保费如上图所示，包括:
总保费如上图所示，包括：

亲爱 %s,

谢谢您使用%s. 我们很高兴在下面提交您的报价细节。

，如果您有与此报价的任何问题，请联系我们，%s。

亲爱%s,

谢谢您使用%s,我们很高兴在下面提交您的报价细节。这已被提交给我们的承保部门，签发想关保险。

，如果您有与此报价的任何问题，请联系我们，%s。

亲爱%s，

谢谢您使用%s, 不幸的是，我们的在线系统无法满足您的特定需求提供了一个自动报价。然而，细节已经提交承保部门，将尽快与您联系。

,如果您有与此报价的任何问题，请联系我们，%s。
请输入您的电子邮件地址，密码将通过电子邮件发送给你。
请输入您的银行帐户号码或代码，使我们可以从您的帐户付款
帐户人的身份证件号码
请输入您的信用卡/借记卡信息
从上述帐户您将支付s%,根据帐户直接付款保证条款。我知道，有关帐户人和付款项目及详情会以电子方式传递到我的银行。

直接付款保证
银行提供这种采取直接付款保证计划，并提供相关的安全的监测和保护。
  • 如果金额将支付或付款日期发生变更，你将被提前8天被告知，在您的帐户发生扣除之前。
  • 如果错误是由%s或您的银行，您会从支付的银行获得扣除的金额。
  • 如果您通过书面形式向您的银行取消直接付款，也请把你的信的副本发送给我们。

请注意，你必须确认你没有提供虚假信息或假冒别人的资料，你提交的这一保险和支付费用。您还确认，你是唯一合法授权人可以从您的帐户借记的。如果你不能确定，请与我们联系。

您可以联系我们,%s
请选择此框，以确认您输入的细节是正确的
